title: Azure SDK Official Repositories
body:
Official Azure SDK repositories collection:

- Azure SDK for .NET: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-net
- Azure SDK for Python: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-python
- Azure SDK for JavaScript: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-js
- Azure SDK for Java: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java
- Azure SDK for Go: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-go
- Azure CLI: https://github.com/Azure/azure-cli

These repositories contain the official Azure SDKs for various programming languages, providing libraries and tools for Azure service integration.
